title: REMIX: The Hags Talk Film & Television
itunes:title: REMIX: The Hags Talk Film & Television
description:
This week's episode is a remix, a recapitulation, indeed a recontextualization of the Hags' most erudite excursions into film and television. 

.

.

.

.

.

This episode was edited and engineered by C. Tweedie.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
